text: waldhyn astwtnu "almdyn", waminuu min qibal hijrat almuhajirin -whm alansar- yuhibuwn almhajryn, wywaswnhm bamwalhm, wala yajidun fi 'anfusihim hsdana lahum mimaa 'uetu min maal alfy' wghyrh, wyuqaddimwn almuhajirin wdhwy alhajat ealaa anfshm, walaw kan bihim hajat wfqr, wamin salim min albkhl wmane alfadl min almal fawlyk hum alfayizun aldhyn fazuu bmtlwbhm
